restful

Class RSFriends

  • java.lang.Object
    • restful.RSFriends

  • public class RSFriends
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class Provides a Restful interface to the system, specifically for friends interactions, with the path /friends

      Post method for getting a list of potential friends, the client sends a list of UsernameNumbers with empty usernames, this method looks up the numbers its been sent by the client and responds with a refined list of UsernameNumbers where the telephone number matches a user on the system.

      • postNumbersJsonOrXML

        public java.util.List<UsernameNumber> postNumbersJsonOrXML(java.util.List<UsernameNumber> numbers,
                                                  java.lang.String username,
                                                  @Context
                                                  javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo context)
        Post method for getting a list of potential friends, the client sends a list of UsernameNumbers with empty usernames, this method looks up the numbers its been sent by the client and responds with a refined list of UsernameNumbers where the telephone number matches a user on the system. For Example Client sends (Username:" ",Number"0770000001") Response (Username:"John",Number"0770000001")
        Parameters:
        numbers - the list of numbers that the client want to look up
        username - the username of the client
        context - context path
        Returns:
        List of UsernameNumbers where the username

      • NumbersJsonOrXML

        public java.util.List<UsernameNumber> NumbersJsonOrXML(java.lang.String username,
                                              @Context
                                              javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo context)
        Get method to get all usernames and numbers on the system, used for testing.
        Parameters:
        username - username of the client
        context - context of the request
        Returns:
        List of UsernameNumbers for all users on the system

      • requestFriendJsonOrXML

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response requestFriendJsonOrXML(java.lang.String initUsername,
                                               java.lang.String recpUsername,
                                               @Context
                                               javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo context)
        Get method for requesting a friendship, based on the clients username (initUsername) and the other user they want to befriend (recpUsername).
        Parameters:
        initUsername - client username
        recpUsername - username of user the client wants to befriend
        context - context of the request
        Returns:
        Response OK - if the request is successful, NOTMODIFIED- if the username don't exist or the request has already been made or if the users are already friends.

      • getPendingFriendsJsonOrXML

                                                    @Context
                                                    javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo context)
        Get method for getting a list of pending friends, i.e. the list of friend requests.
        Parameters:
        username - clients username
        context - context of the request
        Returns:
        List of FriendBonds for all of the pending friends.

      • getFriendsJsonOrXML

        public java.util.List<AppUser> getFriendsJsonOrXML(java.lang.String username,
                                          @Context
                                          javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo context)
        Get method for getting a list of user's friends
        Parameters:
        username - of the client
        context - context of the request
        Returns:
        List of AppUsers, one for each friend, or null if the user has no friends.

      • acceptFriendJsonOrXML

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response acceptFriendJsonOrXML(java.lang.String initUsername,
                                              java.lang.String recpUsername,
                                              @Context
                                              javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo context)
        Get method to Accept a friend request.
        Parameters:
        initUsername - the username of the user who requested the friendship.
        recpUsername - the username of the user who has been request to be a friend.
        context - context of the request.
        Returns:
        Response OK - friendship has been successful, NOTMODIFIED if the request between these two users is not present.

      • declineFriendrequestJsonOrXML

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response declineFriendrequestJsonOrXML(java.lang.String initUsername,
                                                      java.lang.String recpUsername,
                                                      @Context
                                                      javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo context)
        Get method to reject a friend request.
        Parameters:
        initUsername - the username of the user who requested the friendship.
        recpUsername - the username of the user who has been request to be a friend.
        context - context of the request.
        Returns:
        Response OK - friendship has been successfully been declined, NOTMODIFIED if the request between these two users is not present.

      • deleteFriendrequestJsonOrXML

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteFriendrequestJsonOrXML(java.lang.String initUsername,
                                                     java.lang.String recpUsername,
                                                     @Context
                                                     javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo context)
        Get method to Delete a friend.
        Parameters:
        initUsername - the username of the user who is deleting the friend.
        recpUsername - the username of the user who is being unfriended.
        context - context of the request.
        Returns:
        Response OK - friendship has been successfully been deleted, NOTMODIFIED if the friendship between these two users does not exist.

      • modifyNumber

        Parameters:
        number - to modify
        Returns:
        the number with +44 prefix if it starts with 0.
